name: Gmail Inbox Done for Today
description: Enable this style when you want to avoid looking at your gmail inbox. My strategy is that I open my inbox exactly once, do as much as I can, but then I enable this style and it keeps me from going back for more dopamine. Also helps early in the day because maybe it's not time to check my email yet. Check out my other distraction-reducing extensions.

user.name: Malcolm Ocean
